com.googlecode.mrsqg
Class MrsTransformer2

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.mrsqg.MrsTransformer
      com.googlecode.mrsqg.MrsTransformer2

public class MrsTransformer2
extends MrsTransformer

This is the sequel of the original Mrs. Transformer, aka, MrsTransformer2: Revenge of the Dependencies. This new generation of Transformer is equipped with a more productive and upgraded killer technique: Dependency Minimal Recursion Semantics.

Version:
2010-08-12
Author:
Xuchen Yao

setupHiLoEPAll

protected java.util.ArrayList<MRS> setupHiLoEPAll(MRS q_mrs,
                                                  EP hiEP,
                                                  EP loEP,
                                                  java.lang.String neType,
                                                  EP gEP)
Set up hiEP and loEP according to the named entity type neType, and produce an extra MRS for where/when questions ('in which place', 'on what date', etc)

Parameters:
q_mrs - an MRS for a question
hiEP - a high EP in a qeq relation
loEP - a low EP in a qeq relation
neType - a named entity type
gEP - a governor (verb or preposition) EP
Returns:
a list of MRS
